mdRecord.dcterms:title: A plan of the town of Macon, Bibb County, Georgia / laid off according to an act of the Legislature of December, 1822, by James Smith, Oliver H. Prince, Abner Wimberly, Pleasant Phillips, William Hamilton, Commissioners. ; Pblished by George Dane. Rose & Slade Printers, Macon, 1826. ; Copy by A.D. Wilcox, Ast. Engr., City Engineer's Office, August 8th, 1899
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dane, George.
Macon (Ga.). City Engineer's Office.
Rose & Slade.
Smith, James.
Wilcox, A. D.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows the city plan; lots, streets, and squares, as well as landowners.
Note: "The lots were intended to contain, and do contain about half an acre each... Where adjoining lots are owned by the same person the dividing lines is omitted."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: City planning--Georgia--Macon--Maps.

Macon (Ga.)--Maps.
